front.title: IP Integrated Services with RSVP over ATM

abstract.t: This draft describes a method for providing IP Integrated Services with RSVP over ATM switched virtual circuits (SVCs). It provides an overall approach to the problem as well as a specific method for running over today's ATM networks. There are two parts of this problem. This draft provides guidelines for using ATM VCs with QoS as part of an Integrated Services Internet. A related draft[6] describes service mappings between IP Integrated Services and ATM services.
